War Wings was a free-to-play, 3D WWII dogfighting mobile game developed by Mobile Fish and published by Nexon M.

    Mobile Fish & Nexon M
    Discontinued in 2017
    Aug 2014 - Jun 2015


War Wings was initially available for Android only before the rights were released back to Mobile Fish in 2015 due to consolidation.



STATIC AD BANNERS

I created Facebook static ads for user acquisition campaigns during a time when static ads were the standard.


GAME UI ICONS

In-game icons to represent the different tiers and upgrades available to improve the players' plane performance. Not only was I producing assets for marketing but also in developing the UI / UX flow of the user's journey throughout the game.


UX / UX DESIGN FLOW

Main mission Flow

Plane Upgrades

Leaderboard

Daily Login Reward

Tutorial

Gameplay Control Settings



CHARACTER MASCOT DESIGN

Original mascot design by Mobile Fish, with instructions from Nexon M to redesign her to fit mission storyline.




War Wings was a C rank priority project that received A rank development treatment thanks to the Nexon M team in charge of the project. There was close collaboration between Mobile Fish, in Beijing, to overhaul its UX/ UI design to cater heavily to Western audiences.


Team

  • Producer: Jacob Zabie
  • Assistant Producer: Brian Hong
  • Marketing & UI/UX Artist: Emily Lim
